item.title: 13 Cuban soldiers dead after explosion at ammunition depot
item.description: The explosion, which officials said was likely the cause of a short circuit and power failure, prompted the evacuation of more than 1,200 residents.

item.title: Army doctor learns fate for sexually abusing dozens of soldiers
item.description: Maj. Michael Stockin pleaded guilty to 36 counts of abusive sexual contact and five of indecent viewing, officials said.
